thread.title: BRIEF-Guangzhou R&F Properties Co Sees Increase Of Over 190 Pct In FY Consol Profit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangzhou R&F Properties Co Sees Increase Of Over 190 Pct In FY Consol Profit

organizations.name: reuters) - guangzhou r&f properties co ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Guangzhou R&F Properties Co Ltd:
* SEES ‍SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED PROFIT FOR YEAR​
* EXPECTED TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED PROFIT OVER 190 PCT FOR FY
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO NON-RECURRING GAIN ON BARGAIN PURCHASE FOR ACQUISITION OF HOTEL ASSETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
